zsm
===

ZFS Snapshot manager.

|GitHub tests| |Documentation Status|
|PyPI version| |PyPI pyversions| |PyPI license|


Installing
----------

Install package from pkg in FreeBSD.

.. code-block:: text

    pkg install zsm


Install package from PyPI.

.. code-block:: text

    pip install zsm
